title: Muir Woods National Monument: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Muir Woods is open 365 days a year. No reservations are required to visit.The Visitor Center closes 30 minutes before Muir Woods.Muir Beach, Muir Beach Overlook, and Stinson Beach close one hour after Muir Woods.November 1, 2015 - January 30, 2016 Muir Woods 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.  Muir Woods Trading Company Gift Shop 9:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.  Muir Woods Trading Company Cafe 9:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m. January 31, 2016 - March 12, 2016 Muir Woods 8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Muir Woods Trading Company Gift Shop 9:00 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. Muir Woods Trading Company Cafe 9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. March 13, 2016 - September 17, 2016 Muir Woods 8:00 a.m. - 8:00 p.m.Muir Woods Trading Company Gift Shop  - Weekends 9:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m.  - Weekdays 9:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m.Muir Woods Trading Company Cafe  - Weekends 9:00 a.m. - 6:30 p.m.  - Weekdays 9:00 a.m - 5:30 p.m.September 18, 2016 - October 8, 2016 Muir Woods 8:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m.Muir Woods Trading Company Gift Shop 9:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Muir Woods Trading Company Cafe 9:00 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. October 9, 2016 - November 5, 2016  Muir Woods 8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Muir Woods Trading Company Gift Shop 9:00 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. Muir Woods Trading Company Cafe 9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. November 6, 2016 - January 28, 2017 Muir Woods 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m.  Muir Woods Trading Company Gift Shop 9:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m.  Muir Woods Trading Company Cafe 9:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m.
